member.name: CIEXYZTRIPLE
member.summary: The CIEXYZTRIPLE structure contains the x,y, and z coordinates of the three colors that correspond to the red, green, and blue endpoints for a specified logical color space.

member.name: CIEXYZTRIPLE.ciexyzRed
member.summary: The xyz coordinates of red endpoint.

member.name: CIEXYZTRIPLE.ciexyzGreen
member.summary: The xyz coordinates of green endpoint.

member.name: CIEXYZTRIPLE.ciexyzBlue
member.summary: The xyz coordinates of blue endpoint.
